forum.content:
《異星入境》最觸動我的
是Louise說的「溝通」
溝通的開始
不是智力測試
是關心和瞭解
更重要的是
卸下自己的保護罩
容許別人看見自己
“Now that's a proper introduction."
然後
關係很脆弱
請小心呵護

urls.description: When mysterious spacecrafts touch down across the globe, an elite team - lead by expert linguist Lou
urls.title: Arrival (2016) - "They Need to See Me" Clip - Paramount Pictures

forum.title: Louise: They need to see me
